Jason is available to provide assistance on statistical matters related to research or student projects.

Jason is happy to provide guidance regarding:

* study design and planning for data collection;
* data entry and management;
* data analysis;
* interpretation;
* presentation.

Note that these tasks are done with the intention of developing competence in research methods.  With this in mind, Jason will not:

* wrangle an ugly data set;
* fight with R code;
* conduct the analysis;
* write up the results.
